summary:
This mod add the Imperial outfit to Skyrim, an outfit inspired in ancient Rome clothing.
The outfit comes in two versions, short and long, and it also has some complements: sleeves, belt, sandals, short sandals, bracelets and laurel crown.
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=yellow]
[size=3]---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
You can not use my assets in any mods/files that are being sold, for money, on Steam Workshop or other platforms
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/size]
[/color][/center]

Name: Ashara's Imperial outfit
Version: 2.0
Date: 05-07-2014
Category: Clothing
Requirements: Latest Skyrim official patch
Author(s): Ashara
Source:
* English:
** On Nexus: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51682/?
** On Steam: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=234384441
* Russian:
** Translation by Santias on modgames.net: http://modgames.net/load/tes_v_skyrim/odezhda/ashara_imperial_outfit_imperskie_platja_ot_ashara/276-1-0-17331
* Spanish:
** Translation by Zaxxon007 on Nexus: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/84432/?

[center]Thanks to Seren4XX, Sloth, Gwanuneg and Sidras for the showcasing videos:

[youtube]plYFsrQbVus[/youtube] [youtube]mGsiZSq9pOg[/youtube] [youtube]FzmIWxF1cp4[/youtube] [youtube]4uHItIdUwKY[/youtube][/center]
[center][size=14][color=yellow]Description
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
This mod add the Imperial outfit to Skyrim, an outfit inspired in ancient Rome clothing.
The outfit comes in two versions, short and long, and it also has some complements: sleeves, belt, sandals, short sandals, bracelets and laurel crown.

The long outfit, short outfit and sleeves have four available colours: white, black, red and blue.
The belt, sandals and short sandals are available in golden, silver and brown colours.
The bracelets come in golden, silver and iron colours.
The laurel crown comes in golden, silver and "natural" (i.e. green and brown) colours.

All items can be forged at the tanning rack under the Imperial section, and are fully enchantable.

I've followed the slot usage convention explained here: http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php/Skyrim_bodyparts_number

Long outfit Statistics
----------------------------------------------
* Slot = 32 (Body)
* Weight = 2
* Value = 1,000
* Armour rating = None
* Type of armour = None
* Enchantment = None

Short outfit Statistics
----------------------------------------------
* Slot = 32 (Body)
* Weight = 1
* Value = 500
* Armour rating = None
* Type of armour = None
* Enchantment = None

Sleeves Statistics
----------------------------------------------
* Slot = 58
* Weight = 0.5
* Value = 50
* Armour rating = None
* Type of armour = None
* Enchantment = None

Belt Statistics
----------------------------------------------
* Slot = 52
* Weight = 0.75
* Value = 100
* Armour rating = None
* Type of armour = None
* Enchantment = None

Bracelets Statistics
----------------------------------------------
* Slot = 56
* Weight = 1
* Value = 250
* Armour rating = None
* Type of armour = None
* Enchantment = None

Laurel crown Statistics
----------------------------------------------
* Slot = 42 (Circlet)
* Weight = 0.5
* Value = 1,500
* Armour rating = None
* Type of armour = None
* Enchantment = None

Sandals Statistics
----------------------------------------------
* Slot = 37 (Feet)
* Weight = 1
* Value = 150
* Armour rating = None
* Type of armour = None
* Enchantment = None

Short sandals Statistics
----------------------------------------------
* Slot = 37 (Feet)
* Weight = 1
* Value = 80
* Armour rating = None
* Type of armour = None
* Enchantment = None

[size=14][color=yellow]Required mods
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
The female bodies used for the armour are the default UNP bodies ([url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709[/url]).

The male bodies used for the armour are the The male bodies used for the armour are the Sundracon bodies ([url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488//?]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488//?[/url]).

Theres is also a patch under optional files, made by Nemmitron, that converts the meshes to the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?]SevenBase body.[/url]

Pringles89 has also released a version for UNP-TBBP here: [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52044/?]Ashara Imperial Outfit UNP TBBP[/url]

If you use another body mod you may see weird textures in places were the clothing shows the skin or see some clipping.


[size=14][color=yellow]Install
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
[color=turquoise]STANDALONE VERSION
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
Install using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Download the file
2. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the "Activates the selected mod" button.
If asked if you want to overwrite existing files say "Yes to all".

Manual install
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Extract the files of this mod to a temporary location (you can use 7zip: http://www.7-zip.org, to unzip them) and chek the folder structure.
2. Copy to (install folder)SkyrimData:
.- the AsharaImperialOutfit.esp
.- the meshes folder
.- the textures folder
3. Open the Skyrim launcher and in "Data files" check the AsharaImperialOutfit.esp. Make sure that the esp is loaded after Skyrim.esm and Update.esm and that both are active.
If asked if you want to overwrite existing files say "Yes to all".

[color=turquoise]PARTY OUTFIT REPLACER
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
Install using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM) - HIGLY RECOMMENDED
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Download the file
2. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the "Activates the selected mod" button.
3. The installer will ask you several options (if it doesn't work, close Nexus Mod Manager, open it again and then activate the mod: it should work fine then)
If asked if you want to overwrite existing files say "Yes to all".

[color=turquoise]WEDDING DRESS REPLACER
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
Install using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM) - HIGLY RECOMMENDED
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Download the file
2. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the "Activates the selected mod" button.
3. The installer will ask you several options (if it doesn't work, close Nexus Mod Manager, open it again and then activate the mod: it should work fine then)
If asked if you want to overwrite existing files say "Yes to all".

[color=turquoise]JARL ELISIF'S CLOTHES REPLACER
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
Install using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM) - HIGLY RECOMMENDED
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Download the file
2. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the "Activates the selected mod" button.
3. The installer will ask you several options (if it doesn't work, close Nexus Mod Manager, open it again and then activate the mod: it should work fine then)
If asked if you want to overwrite existing files say "Yes to all".

[size=14][color=yellow]Uninstall
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
[color=turquoise]STANDALONE VERSION
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
Uninstall using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the "Deactivates the selected mod" button.

Manual uninstall
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Delete:
.- the AsharaImperialOutfit.esp
.- the folder texturesAsharaImperial outfit and its contents
.- the folder meshesAsharaImperial outfit and its contents

[color=turquoise]PARTY OUTFIT REPLACER
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
Uninstall using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM) - HIGLY RECOMMENDED
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the "Deactivates the selected mod" button.

[color=turquoise]WEDDING DRESS REPLACER
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
Uninstall using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM) - HIGLY RECOMMENDED
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the "Deactivates the selected mod" button.

[color=turquoise]JARL ELIFI'S CLOTHES REPLACER
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
Uninstall using Nexus Mod Manager (NMM) - HIGLY RECOMMENDED
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------
1. Select the file in the Mods tab of NMM, and click on the "Deactivates the selected mod" button.

[size=14][color=yellow]Incompatibility
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
[color=turquoise]STANDALONE VERSION
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
None that I am aware of. If you find anything, please tell me.

[color=turquoise]PARTY OUTFIT REPLACER
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
As this replaces the party outfit it will be incompatible with any other mod that modifies/replaces those outfits. If you find anything else, please tell me.

[color=turquoise]WEDDING DRESS REPLACER
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
As this replaces the wedding dress it will be incompatible with any other mod that modifies/replaces those outfits. If you find anything else, please tell me.

[color=turquoise]JARL ELISIF'S CLOTHES REPLACER
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
As this replaces Jarl Elisif's clothes it will be incompatible with any other mod that modifies/replaces those outfits. It is completely compatible with mods that only change her appearance or statistics, as this replaces doesn't touch the NPC. If you find anything else, please tell me.

[size=14][color=yellow]Known issues or bugs
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
There is some clipping in some poses, mostly with the long skirt and the sleeves.
If you find anything else, please tell me.

[color=turquoise]JARL ELISIF'S CLOTHES REPLACER
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]
If you see the vanilla clothes on Elisif, open the console, click on her (make sure you've selected her, not the throne or another NPC) and type "resetinventory" (without commas).

[size=14][color=yellow]Mods used in pictures
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
* The Dragon jewelry shown in pictures is from my mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14146/?]Dimonized dress and jewelry[/url]

[size=14][color=yellow]Related mods
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
* Pringles89's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52044/?]Ashara Imperial Outfit UNP TBBP[/url]
* Foaman's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24684/?]UNP Clothing Merchants[/url]. The items of this mod are added to a merchant named Victoria.
* jacknifelee's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57559/?]Age Of Empire[/url]. A beautiful retexture of the clothes here, inspired by costumes from SPARTACUS: BLOOD & SAND TV-show.
* Aisaka's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57953/?]Byrgith and Rannweig - dragon priestesses followers[/url]. These followers use the sandals from this mod.
* Rivergenesis' [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80163/?]Adia Star's Imperial Goddess[/url].A beautiful retexture of the clothes here.
* okame28's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/80852/?]OK_Custom Voice Followers[/url] and the SSE version [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/6599/?]OK_Custom Voice Followers_SE[/url]. These followers use the sandals from this mod.
* livtempleton's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/82241/?]Mashup Tribe Dresses UNP[/url]. A great mashup collection that uses some items from this mod.

[size=14][color=yellow]Tutorials
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
* [url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php?title=Creating_an_armour_for_Skyrim._Part_1]Creating an armour for Skyrim. Part 1[/url]
* [url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php?title=Creating_an_armour_for_Skyrim._Part_2]Creating an armour for Skyrim. Part 2[/url]
* [url=http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php?title=Converting_an_armour_to_another_body_for_Skyrim]Converting an armour to another body for Skyrim[/url]
* [http://wiki.tesnexus.com/index.php?title=User:SydneyB]Other Tutorials[/url]

[size=14][color=yellow]History
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
2.0, 23-01-2015 - Added the beautiful retextures done by Jacknifelee under the optional files section
2.0, 08-07-2014 - Uploaded a replacer for the Wedding dress. NMM will guide you through the installation process.
2.0, 06-07-2014 - Uploaded a replacer for the Party outfit at the Embassy. NMM will guide you through the installation process.
2.0, 05-07-2014 - Added the male version of the clothes.
1.1, 12-04-2014 - Added the beautiful retextures done by Elaneith under the optional files section.
1.1, 11-03-2014 - Fixed the material for the sandals. Now they can be crafted under the Imperial section as intended.
1.0, 09-03-2014 - Added patch for the Seven Base body made by Nemmitron.
1.0, 02-03-2014 - Initial release.

[size=14][color=yellow]Contact
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
You can contact me leaving a comment at the mod's thread or sending me a PM.

You can find me on Nexus as SydneyB: http://www.tesnexus.com/modules/members/index.php?id=259193.
You can find me on the Bethesda official forums as Ashara: http://www.bethsoft.com/bgsforums/index.php?showuser=364891.
You can find me on Clan Dlan as Ashara: http://www.clandlan.net/foros/index.php?showuser=6932.

[size=14][color=yellow]Credits
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to Dimon for the original UNP female body.
Thanks to Brokefoot for the tweaked UNP body, and Kurese for the original tweaking, which I've further tweaked :)
Thanks to Chris57 and Sundracon for the male body.
Thanks to Phygit for the female feet.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on: [url=http://hammondslegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp]http://hammondslegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp[/url]
Thanks to Nexus for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
Thanks to all the modding community for all their tutorials, tools, help and support. Especially, thanks to TES Adventures, the Clan Dlan, Bethesda Official Forum and the Nexus communities.
Thanks to all of you that are using this mod and are helping me to improve it with your suggestions.

[size=14][color=yellow]Tools used
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
Blender - http://www.blender.org
GIMP - http://www.gimp.org/
The Compressonator - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=11852
NIFSkope - http://www.niftools.org/
Construction Kit (available on Steam)
7zip - http://www.7-zip.org/
Readme Generator - http://lhammonds.game-host.org/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

[size=14][color=yellow]Permissions
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
You can reuse any part of this mod into your own mod but all I ask in return is that you give me credit if you distribute any part of this mod.
If you want to reuse the female body credit Brokefoot, Kurese and Dimon, too, and send a PM to Brokefoot before uploading your mod.

[size=14][color=yellow]My Skyrim mods
==========================================================================================================================================[/size][/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18008/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/YSc0Tra.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5577/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/ohkHHQh.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14146/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/o2HteRT.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32978/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/GQgnfi8.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51682/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/TZgzWnf.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36175/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/jSRYTkl.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57613/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/F3wyxgt.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49042/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/WBTbvQW.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6075/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/2eEOdvC.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20729/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/xYkbPT8.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28996/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/LoQBtGD.jpg[/img][/url] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35244/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/sRrsMqv.jpg[/img][/url][/center]
author: SydneyB

files.name: Meshes for 7B Natural BBP
files.changelogHtml:
11-03-2014 - Fixed the material for the sandals. Now they can be crafted under the Imperial section as intended.
12-04-2014 - Added the beautiful retextures done by Elaneith under the optional files section.

files.name: Elaneith retexture pack 1
files.changelogHtml:
11-03-2014 - Fixed the material for the sandals. Now they can be crafted under the Imperial section as intended.
12-04-2014 - Added the beautiful retextures done by Elaneith under the optional files section.

files.name: 1. Imperial outfit v20 - UNP - Sundracon
files.changelogHtml:
06-07-2014 - Uploaded a replacer for the Party outfit at the Embassy.
08-07-2014 - Uploaded a replacer for the Wedding dress.
05-07-2014 - Added the male version of the clothes.
11-07-2014 - Uploaded a replacer for Jarl Elisif's clothes. If you see the vanilla clothes on Elisif, open the console, click on her (make sure you've selected her, not the throne or another NPC) and type "resetinventory" (without commas).
23-01-2015 - Added the beautiful retextures done by Jacknifelee under the optional files section
